caption.p: Example maps of long-term average annual spatial changes (mean of 15 climate scenarios) in denitrification (DENIT) for the BAU scenario in the Mar Menor catchment, nitrogen mineralization (N-MIN) for the MH scenario in the Tyligulskyi Liman catchment, nitrogen transported with runoff (N-RUN) for the CRI scenario in the Ria de Aveiro catchment and phosphorus mineralization (P-MIN) for the SET scenario in the Vistula Lagoon catchment showing a the socio-economic impacts only and the b the combined impacts
